Gangon's spark slowly floated into the device BrightBlade held...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, July 17, 2000 7:47 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars



* BrightBlade smiled as she saw Gangon's spark settle in her hands and greet
her, the sound of her friends voice comforting to her. The sound of Gangon's
voice was always welcoming, it giving her great comfort in the worst of
times.
She then looked back up at Perndabot with the same smile, it then turning to
a sly one in which she was well known for. The sound of doubt in his voice
was not exactly what she would call welcoming but she didn't expect over
confidence in herself either, but with her skills and past experience this
mission was practically the easiest she had ever embarked upon.
BrightBlade nodded as she took in his warning. It was very sensible but she
knew that if he had any real doubts he could always turn back.
She then looked back towards Gangon's spark as Prendabot had taken a step
towards her.  The spark beginning to go din with being separated from his
body.
With a sigh BrightBlade quickly took two pieces of a sphere from a
compartment in her leg and pressed them together, locks on either side
fusing to each other to create a ball of clear materiel.
It was a device she was hoping to use on one of the Maximals, a stasis ball
that was designed to hold a single spark. She was hoping to bring back the
spark of a Maximal to fuse within a Predacon protoform, thus creating
another soldier to fight in Hell Beasts forces. But it was obvious that she
now had to use the ball for a more better purpose, to keep her friend alive.
With a whooshing sound the ball opened, a light mist escaping from it as she
held it towards Gangon's spark. It would sustain him for 48 days if she
chose plenty of time to either locate his body or to find him a new one. But
this would have to do for now.
BrightBlade smiled towards the spark and gestured with her head towards the
open stasis ball. *

" In you get. It'll keep you from fading and even repair what damage you've
sustained. It's only temporary. Just until I find your body or get you a new
one. You should still be able to communicate though."

* She then held the ball closer to him so that he could waste no time in
getting into it, she then would close the ball and place it back in her leg
compartment. Thus still being able to hear him, actually being inside her
body and all.
BrightBlade then turned her head towards Perndabot as he asked her if Gangon
was coming, still holding him in one hand that ball in the other. She nodded
and smiled up at him, careful not to move so that none of her curves could
be seen. *

" Yes, he's intended to come with us. I hope you don't mind. I'm not one to
abandon friends when they need me the most, a quality that most Predacons
lack."
